Description: Body sherd of East Greek, possibly North Ionian, pottery cup; interior: reserved save for single black band with added red band; exterior reserved; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: The sherd probably comes from the same vessel as British Museum 1886,0401.550.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.330)
